::Cyndro::

"And there are more on their way, Commander," Cyndro's voice (he's a ship, yes, but he's a sentient ship) sounds right after Alpha's transmission, "if we don't hurry, we're going to lost that Maximal."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> OOC: I ignored that Cyndro was the Maximals ship so I have to repost.

> Alphah:
